hero.headline: Comprehensive Property Management You Can Rely On
hero.subheadline: From guest communication to cleaning, bookings, and tax compliance—we do it all. Plus, your property is fully optimized for AI-powered search engines through AEO, ensuring it gets found and booked.

whatWeDo.title: Everything Your Rental Needs, All in One Place
whatWeDo.description: SmartHoster provides an all-inclusive management solution tailored for short-term rental owners who want performance without the hassle. We manage cleaning, maintenance, taxes, direct bookings, and more—while optimizing everything for AEO (Answer Engine Optimization), so your listing appears in AI search results like ChatGPT, Google Overviews, and Perplexity. We ensure your listings are enriched with high-quality content and structured metadata, so modern search engines not only find you—but choose you as the answer.

whatIncludes.question: What does full-service management include?
whatIncludes.answer: Everything: listings, guest messages, taxes, direct booking, cleanings, repairs, and compliance.

howOptimized.question: How are listings optimized?
howOptimized.answer: We use SEO and AEO best practices to improve rankings in Google, ChatGPT, and Perplexity — combining keywords with structured answers to questions guests and owners actually ask.

ownCleaner.question: Can I still use my own cleaner or do partial management?
ownCleaner.answer: Yes — we coordinate with your cleaner if you're on a partial package.

platforms.question: What platforms do you list on?
platforms.answer: Airbnb, Booking.com, Vrbo, Google, Tripadvisor, FlipKey, Expedia, and local search directories.

maintenance.question: How do you handle maintenance?
maintenance.answer: Our team monitors every job, logs repairs, and ensures real-time issue resolution with transparent billing.

finalCta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Property Management with an AI-Optimized Advantage?
